channel.title: CVE Feed for KDE -- Konqueror
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KDE -- Konqueror

item.title: CVE-2012-4512|2024-08-06T20:35:09.972Z -- kde -- konqueror
item.description: The CSS parser (khtml/css/cssparser.cpp) in Konqueror in KDE 4.7.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) and possibly read memory via a crafted font face source, related to "type confusion."
